## Testing Checklist

<!-- Check all that apply -->

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

- [ ] I have tested the changes across different browsers (if applicable)

## Security Checklist

<!-- For a security-focused platform, these checks are important -->

- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, credentials, tokens) is committed
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities are introduced
- [ ] Input validation is properly implemented for new endpoints
- [ ] Authentication/Authorization is correctly implemented (if applicable)

## Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined
